attributes.action: Call for all local elections in May 2025 to take place
attributes.additional_details: Because we were never giving the opportunity/right to decide whether this should happen
attributes.background: To allow the voters the right to vote locally in May 2025 and overturn the unelected decision to ‘not hold a local election day’ be reversed

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710155
